Featured project

Career-matching concept for students

Apr 01, 2012

Mathplus is a concept service which helps math-inclined students identify potential career paths in high school. It aims to assist students in the job market by introducing them to successful professionals, practical applications for their skills, and example career paths.

Read more

About me

Hi, I’m Will

I design, research, sketch, write, and code for digitial products. I want to make awesome things that solve problems.

Currently I design prototypes for large-scale websites at SapientNitro for clients like Panera Bread, Analog Devices, and AlzForum.org. I am also a student of mindfulness meditation.

Recently I taught Interaction Design at Massachusetts College of Art and Design GDC Program and presented “UX Tools of the Trade” at the UXPA 2013 Boston Conference.

Previously I graduated from Massachusetts College of Art and Design’s Graphic Design BFA, during which I had three design internships, including at Mullen.

Photo by Jeremiah Louf 2012
